newsitem.title: USA: America First Financial Fund Q1 unit up.
newsitem.headline: America First Financial Fund Q1 unit up.

text.p: NOTE: Q4 earnings were $26.1 million, or $3.53 per unit, but included a net tax benefit adjustment of $20.8 million related primarily to a valuation adjustment for net operating loss carryforwards.
Excluding the net tax adjustment, earnings for the fourth quarter were $5.3 million, or $.79 per unit.

The Fund's net income is primarily generated from EurekaBank, which is located in Foster City, California. EurekaBank has 36 branches in the greater San Francisco Bay Area and $2.2 billion in total asses at March 31, 1997.

The Fund paid distributions of $.40 per unit during the first quarter of 1997. The book value per unit at March 31, 1997 is $28.43, compared to $28.00 at December 31, 1996, and $25.52 at March 31, 1996.
